word_mean: 波长：相连两波相同顶点间的距离
在交变或振荡现象中，一个完整波的位移。波长通常从波峰到波峰或从波谷到波谷测量，以米为单位。

sentence.Network_en: It's great to work with people who are on the same wavelength.
sentence.Network_cn: 与志同道合的人一起工作真是太棒了。

sentence.Network_en: Blue light has a shorter wavelength than red.
sentence.Network_cn: 蓝光的波长比红光的短。

sentence.Network_en: Radio One has broadcast on this wavelength for years.
sentence.Network_cn: 广播1台已经用这个波长广播多年了.

lj.lj_ly: “a fluid . . . production in which author, director, designer and cast seem to be working on the same wavelength”(&b{James Lardner})
lj.lj_ls: “一部作者、导演、设计人员和演员似乎完全协调一致的流畅作品”(&b{詹姆斯·拉德纳})

phrase.cizu_name: on the same wavelength【非正式用语】

entry.def: A wavelength is the distance between a part of a wave of energy such as light or sound and the next similar part.

example.ex: Sunlight consists of different wavelengths of radiation...
example.tran: 阳光由几种不同波长的射线组成。

example.ex: Blue light has a shorter wavelength than red.
example.tran: 蓝光的波长比红光的短。

entry.def: A wavelength is the size of radio wave which a particular radio station uses to broadcast its programmes.

example.ex: She found the wavelength of their broadcasts, and left the radio tuned to their station.
example.tran: 她找到了他们的广播波段，把收音机调到那个位置收听他们电台的节目。

entry.def: If two people are on the same wavelength, they find it easy to understand each other and they tend to agree, because they share similar interests or opinions.

example.ex: It's great to work with people who are on the same wavelength.
example.tran: 与志同道合的人一起工作真是太棒了。

means.word_mean: 1. the distance (measured in the direction of propagation) between two points in the same phase in consecutive cycles of a wave
2. a shared orientation leading to mutual understanding;

list.explanation: 具有相同观点(的)，有问感(的)，相一致(的)，相互协调(的)，相互理解(的)

example.en: We're not on the same wavelength. Let's try again.
example.zh: 我们相互不协调。让我们再试试。

example.en: We kept talking until we were on the same wavelength.
example.zh: 我们继续交谈，直谈到我们相互理解为止。

example.en: Finding a restaurant on your wavelength is easy.
example.zh: 找一家合你胃口的餐馆并不难。

auth_sentence.content: We don't mean small in terms of wavelength.
auth_sentence.res_content: We don't mean small in terms of wavelength.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We don't mean small in terms of wavelength.

auth_sentence.content: Hence entanglement and the de Broglie wavelength is explained.
auth_sentence.res_content: Hence entanglement and the de Broglie wavelength is explained.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Hence entanglement and the de Broglie wavelength is explained.

auth_sentence.content: Carroll has struggled to get on the same wavelength.
auth_sentence.res_content: Carroll has struggled to get on the same wavelength.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Carroll has struggled to get on the same wavelength.

sentences.en: Radio One has broadcast on this wavelength for years.
sentences.cn: 广播1 台已经用这个波长广播多年了。

sentences.en: The authorities were unable to jam this wavelength.
sentences.cn: 当局无法干扰这一波长。

means.word_mean: 具有相同的/不同的思路；合拍；不合拍；与… 所见略同/不同

sentences.en: I find him difficult to talk to—we’re on completely different wavelengths.
sentences.cn: 我没法和他谈话， 因为我们俩完全不对路。

sentences.en: On the subject of marriage, Judith and I are on the same wavelength.
sentences.cn: 在婚姻问题上， 我和朱迪思意见相同。
